summary: Ligue 1 is the top football league in France, with 18 teams competing. It was founded in 1932 and has been won the most times by Paris Saint-Germain. The league operates on promotion and relegation with Ligue 2. Matches are played from August to May, with each team playing 34 games. It is currently ranked as the fifth-best league in Europe. The 2023-24 season champions are Paris Saint-Germain.
title: Ligue 1
